text: North Lawndale, known to residents as simply "Lawndale", is located on the West Side of Chicago, Illinois. It is one of the well-defined community areas in the city of Chicago. North Lawndale later became known as being the largest Jewish settlement in the City of Chicago, with 25% of the city's Jewish population.Steans Family Foundation , Chicago, 2009. Retrieved on 2010-05-11. The Chicago Transit Authority's Pink Line serve this neighborhood. ==References== Category:Community areas of Chicago
title: North Lawndale, Chicago
